Name: Protect Eggs
About the game: Protect Eggs Protect eggs and hatched birds from being caught by foxes and Eagle The player plays a lovely squirrel and Phoenix, looking for the phoenix nest in the beautiful forest, laying eggs (press R key), driving away foxes and eagles during the incubation period of bird eggs (left and right mouse button skills), when the bird is born, it can be summoned around (Q skill) Phoenix nest is divided into three kinds, each with different functions The flame above the bird's head can replenish the life of the big bird Snails on the grass can replenish the flame of birds. Be careful not to hit them too hard Grass is a good place for birds. They can avoid eagles, but they can't escape Fox's nose For the nest with 'shield cover', after laying eggs, it will hatch into birds after waiting for a period of time, and grow up with time. When it grows to the maximum, it can attack foxes and eagles to protect other birds or eggs Tips: laying eggs can be understood as building a system, and the hatched big birds play a role in protecting other birds, which is equivalent to a simple tower defense system Other operations: ESC - out of the game Tab - hidden interface PAUSE - Pause, Continue Game F12 - screenshot
